author: Jonathan Swan
title: The Trump campaign is planning to make Biden's posture toward China a signature attack line
description: The Trump campaign is planning to make Joe Biden's posture toward China one of its major lines of attack during the 2020 campaign, top officials tell Axios. Why it matters: The politics surrounding the U.S. relationship with China may become a bigger domestic…
content:
